titles.title: A resolution designating March 22, 2009, as "National Rehabilitation Counselors Appreciation Day".
A resolution designating March 22, 2009, as "National Rehabilitation Counselors Appreciation Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.)
Designates March 22, 2009, as National Rehabilitation Counselors Appreciation Day. Commends: (1) rehabilitation counselors for their dedication and hard work; and (2) professional organizations for their efforts to assist those who require rehabilitation.
